channel.title: Anyone has a good auto server restarter?
channel.description:
Subject tells it Does anyone have a good code? I think all the tuts with the code are removed and on a strange way my script doesn't work anymore lol. Well, I can't find it anymore ...
P.S, Not Scheduled Tasks Please

item.title: Anyone has a good auto server restarter?
item.dc:creator: @ryan123 ryan123
item.description:
@ryan123 wrote:

omg…guku… Voule is the best auto-restarter out there…get it…you can auto restart every 10, 30, or 60 min.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone has a good auto server restarter?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“lothy, post:23, topic:75566”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=110970.msg1109362#msg1109362 date=1175968023]

No idea,
But I want it restarts, looks funny
And sometimes ppl couldn’t login for some reason so I want it restarts sometimes

All of the things you’ve just mentioned wouldn’t happen if the server login and logout handling wasn’t written in such a crappy manner. :rolleyes:

Its crappy? o noes
[/quote]
If you took the time to read it, you’d realise that it was written really poorly from day 1.[/quote]
I got no time for it,
Since the advertisement gets more spammers lol

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone has a good auto server restarter?
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

I have exactly the same problem, if i run my server via the compiler, no one can get on, so i have to use my auto restarter quite often, i have to use my runserver.bat, instead on perfect compiler 1.7, pretty annoying really.

item.title: Anyone has a good auto server restarter?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote="-fedexer-, post:7, topic:75566"]hey god, you may want to take a look at the antilag.java , came built into a few sources. its ok , it does the job of restarting etc… but i believe it forgets to remove the command prompt from memory , and you get a shit load of CPU usage… although i couldnt find the command prompts themselves, i did find loads of java.exe processes, which in turn were the runserver.bat’s

ill attach it for ya mate it may be of use…[/quote]
Problem, I changed some things inside my antilag.java rofl

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone has a good auto server restarter?
item.dc:creator: @killah246 Killah246
item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

@echo off cls echo Voule Auto restart tskill java /a echo Restarting server title name Voule Auto Restarter java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone has a good auto server restarter?
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

hey god, you may want to take a look at the antilag.java , came built into a few sources. its ok , it does the job of restarting etc… but i believe it forgets to remove the command prompt from memory , and you get a shit load of CPU usage… although i couldnt find the command prompts themselves, i did find loads of java.exe processes, which in turn were the runserver.bat’s

ill attach it for ya mate it may be of use…

Read full topic
